doc.title: Broadway: Brooklyn
doc.plot: A Danish girl settles down in Brooklyn. A murder takes place in the ghetto on Broadway. This sets her in motion to hunt for information. The police and locals refuse to tell her anything. But, an ex-gang-member, a crime-stopper and an optimistic hot-dog salesman, gives her a complete portrait of the gang environment. The Danish girl perseveres, and finally the police release the information regarding the murder.
